product_name: Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover is made with stretchy Polartec(R) fabric that wicks moisture, dries fast and performs as a base layer or mid layer for alpine activities. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fabric provides superior stretch, warmth and moisture management; durable, smooth jersey face slides easily beneath layers. Deep front zipper allows for venting when needed. Nylon elastic cuffs and hem seals out wind. Seamless shoulders for pack-wearing comfort. Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover for men features a low-bulk, slim silhouette. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Patagonia Piton Fleece Pullover is made with stretchy Polartec(R) fabric that wicks moisture, dries fast and performs as a base layer or mid layer for alpine activities.
